data.actual_result: The Plus Sign could not be clicked. No new role is created.
data.expected_result: You would see a role named new role appear at the bottom of the list and you're able to edit it.
data.short_description: "Create Role" button is not clickable on Windows 10
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server that you can manage roles on - Go in server settings -> Roles - The Plus Sign could not be clicked -
